attributes.action: Ban all nhs trusts from charging to park a car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NHS trusts in england charge for car parking. This is immoral! The trusts are hitting the people who can least afford it. When the average person is ill their income drops. They are then penalised by the trusts.
Secondly the land and buildings belong to the nation, so in effect we are being charged to park on our own property. Stop it now
